VEvil.​GameLogic.​Currencies.​ManaContainer
MonoBehaviour
public
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Currencies.​ManaContainer

ManaContainer is the currency in-fight.  This module is used track the mana of an entity willing to execute actions requiring mana-currency.

Variables
onManaValueChanged
private Action<float, float> onManaValueChanged

Invoked when the CurrentMana value has been modified.

Parameters
01

The previous amount of mana.

02

The new amount of mana.

set
}

}

The current amount of mana this ManaContainer have.

MaxMana
public float MaxMana {
get
}

The maximum amount of mana this ManaContainer can have.

Freeze
public bool Freeze {
get;
set
}

If true, this ManaContainer will stop recovering mana.

ProvideMana
public void ProvideMana(
float 
_amount,
bool 
_exceedMax
 = 
false
)

Give a defined amount of mana to this ManaContainer.

Parameters
_amount
float

The amount to give.

_exceedMax
bool

If set to true, the amount won't be clamped to be maximum mana defined in the ManaContainerSettings of this ManaContainer.
